lead_paragraph: Hoffenheim edged visitors Hertha Berlin 1-0 with a first-half goal from Niklas Suele on Sunday to leapfrog their opponents into third place with a fifth straight Bundesliga win.

headline.print_headline: Hoffenheim Up to Third, Modeste Hat-Trick Boosts Cologne
headline.main: Hoffenheim Up to Third, Modeste Hat-Trick Boosts Cologne
